thread.title: Pornhub stats drop as users go for IRL romance on Valentine’s Day
thread.title_full: Pornhub stats drop as users go for IRL romance on Valentine’s Day

author: abayle
title: Pornhub stats drop as users go for IRL romance on Valentine’s Day
text:
Pornhub stats drop as users go for IRL romance on Valentine’s Day INQUIRER.net / 09:52   Image: Pornhub 
Pornhub’s statistics took a nosedive yesterday, on the “day of hearts,” as its viewers prioritize real world interaction versus watching others doing the “interaction.” 
According to Porhhub’s own statistics, it was revealed that traffic dropped as much as 17 percent after 6 p.m. The lowest point was reached at around 9 p.m., after which traffic sharply went back up–probably when everyone else has finished their own businesses. Image: Pornhub 
For those who did stay on the site, the most searched terms were “love,”“passionate” and “romance.” Surprisingly, the rise was much more prominent among the male audience. ADVERTISEMENT 
It appears that even avid Pornhub viewers take some time off during Valentine’s day to get some real life romance and action. Alfred Bayle/ JB
